alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 3:23PM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. North to northeast winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect areas of drifting snow. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
